nodes.excerpt: Blobby is your cute buddy to help you develop healthy habits in the most important aspects of your life, with a strong focus on keeping balance. It uses the power of range-goals, lets you write a daily journal, and has a lot of great hairstyles for Blobby!
nodes.title: Blobby - The cutest habit tracker ever
nodes.author: Simon Rahm

nodes.excerpt: Task Muncher has been developed by Adam Ali of the #EverydayHustle. Stay Laser-focused on munching your weekly tasks. Prioritize whatâ€™s important with our smart, simple, and powerful task management app. Now get to munching those tasks!!
nodes.title: Task Muncher - An app helping you stay laser-focused on munching your tasks
nodes.author: Adam Ali

nodes.excerpt: Discover a new delightful way to create and manage your to-do's. Introducing a new colorful Rank system for tasks and reminders. Sleek is completely customizable! You can change themes and fonts. Set due dates and reminders, add notes, links and more!
nodes.title: Sleek - Tasks delightfully done
nodes.author: Liron Karadi

nodes.excerpt: Best way to manage your OKRs in Jira. Align your daily work to the company strategy with OKRs. Focus on what really matters by tracking your OKRs in Jira.
nodes.title: OKR for Jira - Align your daily work to the company strategy with OKRs
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: 100+ customer onboarding professionals share the challenges, goals, and trends they foresee in 2022. Click â€˜Get itâ€™ to download your copy of The State of Customer Onboarding report.
nodes.title: The State of Customer Onboarding 2022 - The first-ever survey on the customer onboarding space
nodes.author: Kirthika Soundararajan

nodes.excerpt: That inner voice doubting you - â€œAm I a PM? No, I am a PM!â€ This is an end to exactly that. But if you arenâ€™t okay facing harsh reality checks, leave rn. Donâ€™t tell us we didnâ€™t warn you. Jk will be fun. Or will it? :P

nodes.excerpt: Constructor is the lightweight tracking tool for software teams who donâ€™t want a ton of process. With a clean UI, a deep GitHub integration, and assignable comment threads, Constructor helps developers and managers stay focused and collaborate smoothly.
nodes.title: Constructor - Refreshingly simple task tracking for software teams
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: WorkyBe is an AI-powered field and asset management platform that predicts malfunctions and enables the management of maintenance processes for companies with manufacturing and/or maintenance departments.
nodes.title: WorkyBe - AI-powered cloud-based maintenance management platform

nodes.excerpt: Don't miss another growth goal. The Growth Board is a cross-functional view of the KPIs that make up your organization's funnel and contribute to revenue growth. Track targets vs actuals for these KPIs over time, and understand what's planned to achieve them.
nodes.title: Perdoo Growth Board - Plan, track, and deliver revenue growth
nodes.author: Henrik-Jan

nodes.excerpt: Minimal is a full-feature writing + notes app for iOS and Mac. Its distraction-free design enhances focus and open-mindedness. Features include the Note Lifetime, Publish as Website, collaboration, markdown formatting, and more.
nodes.title: Minimal - A meditation inspired writing app for effective notes
nodes.author: Arthur Van Siclen

nodes.excerpt: Centered helps you get into a Flow State faster and stay there longer so you can do your best work. Centered offers Flow Music, Productivity Coaching, Mono-Tasking, Do-Not-Disturb on Mac, Distraction Nudges, and a simple way to see all your Tasks.
nodes.title: Centered - The only to-do list that helps you get things done
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Plan, Note, Organize, Schedule, and Collaborate on your projects with a strong focus on Time. Map out what has to be done today to achieve desired results tomorrow. Timestripe works great both for business and personal life management.
nodes.title: Goal Manager by Timestripe - Beautiful Calendar Ã— Shared Boards Ã— Notes & More...
nodes.author: Sergey Kulinkovich

nodes.excerpt: The first low-code CMS that brings content, design & editorial teams together to create professional publications that scale. And with the world's fastest hosting, Storipress scales with you whether you are a solo blogger or the New York Times.
nodes.title: Storipress - All-in-one web blogging + publishing platform
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Save hours of work each week by eliminating manual data extraction, aggregation, and time-consuming report updates. Unito allows you to automatically extract data from other work tools to build reports and dashboards and keep everything in sync.
nodes.title: Google Sheets 2-Way Sync by Unito - Sync Google Sheets with Trello, Jira, Airtable, and more
nodes.author: Graham Mann

nodes.excerpt: Form new habits, follow existing ones. Find time for them in your tight schedule. Log emotions, feelings and thoughts. Track progress and don't forget your everyday duties and deadlines. We build tee to make your dai- ly routine something unique and exciting!
nodes.title: Next - Daily routine & goals planner
nodes.author: Tomasz K.

nodes.excerpt: Structured is a visual day planner, which combines calendars and to-do lists into an easy-to-use interface. You can schedule tasks with a few taps, see their progress throughout the day and tick them off once you are done.
nodes.title: Structured 2.0 - A simple and beautifully visual day planner for iOS
nodes.author: Leo Mehlig

nodes.excerpt: Pages is a free-for-everyone knowledge base from Process Street. Try it out! â¡ï¸ https://www.process.st/pages Bring your entire company in for free, unlimited access to create, edit, and view company documentation.
nodes.title: Pages by Process Street - A free-forever knowledge base for your entire company.
